page.title: 19SYMINGTON'S CLUBS
page.content: In Symington there are many different clubs e.g.,{GIRLS'CLUB}is held on Wednesday after school is finished and is run by Miss Picken and Mrs. Robb;{FOOTBALL CLUB }is on Saturday and is run by Miss Picken and Mr Buchan;{PONY CLUB}is on Friday run by Mrs Gibson,Mrs. Napier & Miss Summers; {BADMINTON CLUB}on Thursday run by Miss Picken & Mr.Jack ;{JUNIOR YOUTH CLUB} on Tuesday, run by Mr.Kelly & helpers; {SENIOR YOUTH CLUB}on Tuesday & Thursday ,run by Mr.Taylor & his helpers;{SHORT TENNIS CLUB}on Wednesday,run by Mrs.Fulton;{BOWLING {CLUB}is on every day and is run by the members;{EVERGREEN CLUB}&{AGE CONCERN} both cater for senior citizens;{SLIM- {LINE CLUB}meets on a Tuesday and is for weight watchers.Those are just some of the clubs which are held in SYMINGTON.
